Plot Graphs for Classification

The plots to visualise results from the classification process are:

Sampling

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_samples_on_map(df_samples: DataFrame) → None

plot the PLZ in the sample set on a plotly map

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_samples_per_regiostarclass(df_samples: DataFrame) → None

plot bar chart with number of samples per regiostar 7 class

Parameter Reduction

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_factor_analysis(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame, n_comps: int) → None

plot factor analysis for dataset

Parameters:

  • df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids

  • n_comps (int) – number of components for factor analysis

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_eigendecomposition(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame) → None

plot the explained variance of the principal components

Parameters:

df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_correlation_matrix(corr)

plot correlation matrix

Indices

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_ch_index_for_clustering_algos(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame, no_of_clusters_allowed: range = range(3, 8)) → None

plot the calinski harabasz index for the indicated range of clusters and the clusterin algorithms kmeans, kmedoids, gmm

Parameters:

  • df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids

  • no_of_clusters_allowed (range) – the range the number of clusters allowed to have, , defaults range(3, 8)

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_db_index_for_clustering_algos(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame, no_of_clusters_allowed: range = range(3, 8)) → None

plot the davies bouldin index for the indicated range of clusters and the clusterin algorithms kmeans, kmedoids, gmm

Parameters:

  • df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids

  • no_of_clusters_allowed (range) – the range the number of clusters allowed to have, defaults range(3, 8)

Clustering Results

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_radar_graph(representative_networks: DataFrame, list_of_parameters: list) → None

plots the representative networks of a clustering algorithm as radar graphs

Parameters:

  • representative_networks (pd.DataFrame) – table of parameters of representative networks

  • list_of_parmeters (list of strings) – parameters that are plotted in radar graph

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_percentage_of_clusters(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame) → None

plot the distribution of clusters as a bar chart

Parameters:

df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids that are clustered and thus have a column named ‘clusters’

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_stacked_distribution_of_clusters_per_regio_5(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame) → None

plot stacked bar chart of distribution of clusters for each regio 5 class

Parameters:

df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids that are clustered and thus have a column named ‘clusters’

plotting.plotting_classification.plot_bar_distribution_of_clusters_per_regio_5(df_grid_parameters: DataFrame) → None

plot bar chart of distribution of clusters for each regio 5 class

Parameters:

df_grid_parameters (pd.DataFrame) – set of parameters for grids that are clustered and thus have a column named ‘clusters’
